content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including all photo tutorials in one printable file without advertisements need a last minute gift make a crochet snowman candy cane holder this cute and super quick crochet christmas ornament also doubles as a fun diy christmas gift tag **snowman s friends** make an ornament gift set santa 2 gingerbread boy & girl 3 reindeer 4 elf 5 **yarn** i used a worsted weight cotton yarn but several other fibers will work as well crochet candy cane holder is an a crocheted simplicity original design join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted simplicity & love crafts all of my patterns are written in standard american terms unless noted otherwise please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds however i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions © 2023 designed by jennifer renaud aka a crocheted simplicity all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of a crocheted simplicity the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and charity sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to a crocheted simplicity is greatly appreciated no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from jennifer renaud 1 https //www acrochetedsimplicity com/crochet-snowman-candy-cane-holder/ 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/santa-candy-cane-holder-ornament 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/gingerbread-man-candy-cane-holder-ornament 4 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/reindeer-candy-cane-holder-ornament 5 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/elf-candy-cane-holder-ornament
